articles.title: All the smart home products at CES 2021 - CNET
articles.description: CES 2021 may have been virtual this year, but plenty of new smart home products were unveiled in time with the show.
articles.content: The Lutron Outdoor Plug is an $80 smart outlet that's built to connect wirelessly with your phone while withstanding the elements. Just plug it into power and pair it with the Lutron Bridge using Lut… [+329 chars]
